"I don't know," you say and sit to eat. "Eric I asked you to get Sam from the neighbor's." Your mom says accusingly.

Perplexed you shrug and respond, "No, you didn't,"

"I told him, Mom," Cellist says and gets back up. "I'm not eating right now anyway. Friday night and me and my friends are going out."

"No, she didn't tell me because she was on the phone all afternoon..."

"Eric, I..." Your mother doesn't say more and just leaves to go get her youngest son from the neighbor.

"Eww, you're in trouble," Courtney says and smiles. Then her cell rings again.

"You know what, forget this...You people treat your things better than me...go to hell..." you storm out and go up stairs.

"I'm telling mom you said that..." is distantly yelled behind you.

You just your door and just fall on your bed. What a day...You close your eyes...

Pairs of shoes line the floor, shirts and skirts hang from hangers, and a pile of discarded underwear lays in the corner. If she sees you, there'll be a lot of explaining to do, so you get clever.

You hide your body behind the shirts, out of view. However, this leaves your feet exposed. You shove your feet into a pair of sneakers, perfectly disguising them. Just in time too, as your naked mother opens the door to the closet.

It's all you can do to not scream as the naked body of your mother gets closer to you. She shuffles through the shirts, dangerously near to your beaten body. Her hand brushes your hair....

"Found one." Janet grabs a t-shirt from right next to your face. You let out a breath. It's not over yet, as Janet bends down to shuffle through the undies on the floor. Then, the shoes. Her eyes glance down at the pink sneakers on your feet. Your heart stops.

She shakes her head and grabs a pair of strappy sandals right next to them, then leaves the tiny room. You wait a minute, five minutes, ten minutes, before venturing out of your hiding place. Ear to the door, you don't hear her.

Looking between the monster ous digits you see as far as your mothers kneecap before the colossal toes descend and the the sound of fibers bending and snapping can be heard. The toes compress with unfathomable magnitude and I am instantly separated from the carpet fiber I was attatched to and instead found myself attatched to an even bigger piece of lint in the broiling inferno of foot stink between my mothers second and third toe.

11421121211.content:
Meanwhile, your mother becomes aware of how cold the soles of her feet feel. Ever since she got up she has been walking back and forth across the tiled and linoleum floors of the house, apart from the carpet. She normally puts on her slippers before having breakfast but she was so busy today that she forgot. At a brisk fast, she turns and heads back to her bedroom. She locates her closed-toe slippers and begins putting her feet into them. She has had them a long time and they are fairly worn. She religiously wears them every morning and again in the evening before bed. As a result, the faded, roughened fur interior of the slippers are slightly oily and saturated with her foot odour.

You are currently about the size of a grain of sand and packed deep into the space between your mother’s muscular second and third toes, and are receiving very little light. However, even that minute source of light is cut off once your mother’s mammoth slipper is pulled around her foot, so that you are left in complete darkness. Now all you are aware of is the insane pressure on all sides of you, keeping you squished almost flat – not to mention the nauseating stench gusting out from the huge ravines that are your mother’s toe crevices.. Every time your mother lifts her foot into the air and the pressure of the floor against her foot is removed, her toes loosen around you slightly, until her foot comes crashing down, and the muscles of her entire foot tense as the pressure of the floor returns. Her great toes push in against you, You wonder if it’s possible for something to be squashed so flat that its pushed out of existence entirely – if so, every time your mother steps down, her toes very much threaten to make that a reality for you.
Your eyes water from the smelly air you are forced to breath in. You can’t even hold your breath every now again because every time the toes tense around you, your chest is squeezed in and out like an accordion, basically forcing the rancid air in and out of your lungs whether you like it or not.
Your mother takes a seat at the kitchen table to eat breakfast., She begins absent-mindedly scrunching her massive, muscular toes, trying to get the friction to warm up the slippers’ interior. With every powerful flex and scrunch, you are pulled and squeezed like taffy – if you were human, your bones would probably break and your muscles snap, but because you are only a tiny speck of lint, you are fantastically flexible and your tiny body is able to be manipulated in all sorts of ways by her innocent exertions.

Occasionally her toes perform an especially constricting scrunch. The sound of her toe joints cracking blasts through the air like a bomb going off, and leaves your ear drums ringing. But on top of that, the pressure in the space between her toes seems to become too great. However, thanks to your plasticity, and the sticky film of sweat and oil coating you, your near microscopic body slips like soap out the bottom of your mother’s second toe crevice, only to be effectively scooped up by the huge fleshy bulb that is the underside of the tip of your mother’s second toe. Due to being covered in smelly, sebaceous residue, and having been liberally coated in sticky toe cheese, your body easily becomes glued in place, and in the sweltering heat of the slipper, your sticky coating quickly dries, leaving you helplessly plastered against the tip of her toe. The toes then uncurl and resume their position upon the dirty, scuffed floor of the slipper.
You are lowered and pressed face down against the furred, leathery bottom of the slipper. Your mother begins to slid her foot in and out of the slipper, which causes you to be grinded back and forth. Your mouth is pulled open and you are forced to taste the sour trails of sweat and oil that have built up along the bottom of the slipper.

Your mother finishes her breakfast and stands up. She wiggles her toes with anticipation. On your scale, this is such a forceful action that it causes you to be accidentally flicked, like a speck of dirt, from under the second toe. As her toes wiggle, she momentarily spreads them, and you unluckily go shooting back into the space between her second and third toe. Her toes close again, sealing you in a familiar - but not welcome - dark, putrid prison.

What does she decide to do?

114211212111.content:
Your mother heads into the bathroom. You are a speck-sized piece of lint wedged between her second and third toe. Your surroundings boom and shake every time she takes a step. She and starts the water going and begins getting undressed. She slides her feet out of her slippers and rests them on the bathroom tiles and gives them a little wiggle. You shiver as feel the sudden coolness of the tiles emanate up between her toes, and as the pressure around you loosens for a moment as the toes shift around, you momentarily see the enormous spectacle that is your mother’s mountainous, naked body: her skyscraper legs which end in the tangled black forest that is her bush. Above that, the long plane of her flat stomach and the huge black sinkhole that is her bellybutton. Above that, two mountains jut out, suspended way above you, and swing slightly with respiration. Each round reddened nipple is about the size of a car compared to you. Finally, there is the enormous planetary globe that is her head.

The toes close in around you again, blocking you off from that unbelievable view. Your mother lifts her feet up and gets into the tub and sits down, drawing her legs up close. You are plunged underwater with her toes. In fear of drowning you are forced to bury yourself deeper into the space between your mother’s toes – as much as that pains you to do so. Luckily your face comes upon a tiny air bubble trapped inside a fold of toe flesh. Unluckily, the rich, cheesy odour of your mother’s toes is intensely concentrated in this pocket of air. You want to live, so you are forced to fill your lungs with it, as much as it makes your eyes water and your head swim with nausea.

By contrast, your mother is really enjoying her bath, and begins to scrunch her toes in delight. This causes your face to be grinded into the stinking pocket of toe flesh over and over. You helplessly feel your face being smashed into the source of the stench, the sticky greasy glob of toe cheese caught deep underneath the fold of skin, and its smeared over your face. You shut your mouth but fail to prevent the gunk being pushed up your nostrils and overloading your olfactory region of your brain. You can’t even keep your mouth shut forever because you need to take a breath, and as soon as you do, a neverending train of the gunk batters its way between your lips, down your throat, and begins piling up inside your stomach. Your stomach starts to bloat out and your cheeks bulge. The stuff is oily on your tongue, like butter, and you want to throw up but your stomach is so full that no vomit can come up.
You are sure you will be buried alive in the stuff, but then your mother finally lifts her feet out of the water and rests them on either side of the tap, and you are able to dig out of the fold of flesh and eject the contents of your stomach, which fall into the water, unnoticed by your mother.

Your feel body starts to tingle - what happens?

1142112121111.content:
To save time, your mother decides to brush her teeth while she is bathing. She reaches out and pulls her toothbrush off the counter of the sink, whilst her toes wiggle joyfully. For a split second you are looking from the space between her shifting toes, and then all of a sudden you find yourself teleported to the other end of the bath.

The first thing you are aware of is that you are much bigger and your body is tall and narrow, but you are too stiff to move. This is irritating because there is a fleck of dust tickling your nose and you can’t swat it away. For some reason your face feels much softer than your body, and somehow bendable. You are also aware of something big and warm wrapped around your body; from your shoulders to your feet. Only your head and neck pokes out. You feel like you are trapped in a huge mound of clay; it feels soft, but not soft enough for you to free yourself (that is, if you could move).

The clay also has a pleasing fragrant scent about it, which is such a relieving change from the awful smells you’ve just been exposed to that it makes you dizzy.
As you are levitating in the air, the object holding you revolves until you are met with the sight of your mother, her top half rising out of the lake of bath water like a huge statue. To be fair, she isn’t half as big as she was when you were a piece of lint, but she is still huge.

You realise with dread that you have been turned into the toothbrush she had collected from the sink – and is now probably planning to use you!
She gazes down at you with a serene smile, and then brings you right up close to her face, just in front of her chin. She angles her head down over you and by instinctual human modesty you feel completely naked and objectified as she scrutinises you for a minute, even though you know you don’t have a human body.
You don’t realise it, but in reality she is giving you a quick examination to make sure the bristles – that is, your face - are clean. Her mouth is slightly open and you are completely powerless as her morning breath repeatedly washes over you like a humid tidal wind. Both your nostrils as well as your tongue are overwhelmed by the grainy trace of the cereal, the sour fruity tang of yoghurt, and the overpowering rich, acrid scent of coffee. All of these scents have combined into a revolting cocktail that turns your stomach.

Her other hand rises up and a giant index finger moves into your field of vision, the red painted fingernail glistening under the bathroom lights. She has noticed the flake of dust caught in your bristles – the one that was tickling your nose – and intends to dislodge it. She begins to gently scratch your face with her fingernail, trying to comb the dust free of your bristles. You hate to admit it but it feels really good; as if you had a thick beard and had fingernails raking through it. But it also adds to your embarrassment and feeling of helplessness.

Your mother successfully fishes the fleck of dust out of your face, and satisfied with your condition, runs her index finger right down your face a couple of times for good measure. Each time she does this, your face is flattened under the pad of her finger, and then flicks back up in rows, before being flattened again.

She is now ready to use you.
1142112121111.title: You turn into a toothbrush

choices: You remain her toothbrush; she brushes her teeth
You get turned into the toothpaste
11421121211111.content:
Your mother’s tongue pokes out from between her lips briefly, horribly close to you and you get another face full of her bad breath. She licks her lips and then her tongue disappears back into her mouth, leaving her lips shining with a thin film of bubbly saliva. You realise with growing horror that In about another minute you will be coated in the stuff yourself.

Your mother grabs some toothpaste from a shelf with her free hand. The only problem is that the cap is encrusted with dried toothpaste, making it difficult to juggle you while trying to remove it. She decides she needs both hands to unscrew the cap, so without thinking twice, she pops your head into her mouth while she twists the cap off. It happens so fast that you didn’t even know what happened; all of a sudden your head was plunged into a dark cavern. To hold you place, your mother clamps her top and bottom front teeth down around your neck. You cry out in protest as the sharp unforgiving, gleaming white incisors dig into your neck. As much as it sucks to be a toothbrush, you have to admit, if you were human you would have been decapitated by now.
You can barely see in the darkness, but you can smell the hot fumes of her sour breath blowing right at you, and actually leaving tiny droplets of saliva on your face.

The toothpaste cap is stuck on more than it looked. Your mother begins to hum as she works away at it. Your body effectively absorbs the vibrations of her humming, as if you were a little tuning fork. You are incredibly unnerved as you actually feel her voice enter you and the powerful vibrations move along inside your core, right to your feet. For a moment you almost felt like you had transformed again and literally become her voice as it issued from her throat, but no, you were still a toothbrush.

“Stupid thing,” you mother curses at the stubborn toothpaste lid. Your head is bounced back and forth between her teeth as she mouths these words.
In her impatience, she idly shifts her jaw back and forth, wiggling your handle end up and down rapidly. You can also feel the pressure of her tongue pressing firmly against the top of your head to keep it in place while her front teeth shift around. You want to cry from embarrassment. You never consented to being a toothbrush and being manhandled like this by your own mother!
After what seems like a long time, she manages to flick off the cap.

114211212111111.content:
The opening of the tube of toothpaste hovers over you. Your mother squeezes the tube, depositing a big glob squarely onto your face. At least the minty substance smells better than her breath.

You are raised through the air and feel your head slide through her pillowy lips and bump against the hard surface of her front teeth. You are hit by a wave of her morning breath. The smell invades her whole mouth and it smothers you like a thick blanket. You may not be looking forward to brushing her teeth, but at least you can hope to eliminate the stench of her breath.

She grips your body tighter and you are then jolted back and forth as she scrubs your head against her teeth. Your face bends and distorts against the pressure of her teeth, whilst the sides of your head are continually massaged by her soft plump lips. Her grip rotates and manoeuvres your head effortlessly, slipping the bristles of your face into the tight spaces between teeth to dig out the slimy crumbs of food stuck in there.

The most humiliating part of this is when she gets out of the bath and checks her teeth in the mirror. With her mouth wide open, you can see outside to your mother's enormous reflection, and gripped in her hand, is you - or rather, the toothbrush that is you. Your head is held up just in front of her bottom lip. It hits you how tiny you are compared to her - smaller than a doll in her grasp. Your head is utterly dwarfed by the gargantuan cavern that is her mouth. As she inspects the gleaming surfaces of her teeth, she absent-mindedly taps your head against her teeth.

She then decides to finish by using your face to stroke back and forth along the surface of her tongue. This dislodges some disgusting fuzzy substance coating her tongue, which then clings to your face. You catch glimpses of yourself in the mirror, your tiny head resting on your mother's broad bumpy red tongue, as your face is rubbed back and forth along it, and it makes you want to cry from how degrading it looks.

Finally she finishes, rinses your head under the water, and puts you in a holder next to the sink.
By the time she finishes with you your face feels like it has been ground off by the unyielding surface of her teeth. You are pulled out of her mouth, and she once again scratches your face with a great big fingernail to dig out the crumbs of food that have gotten caught on you. You shiver when she then runs your head under the frigid tap water, and then gives you a brisk shake.

You are put into a toothbrush holder while your mother leaves the bathroom in a towel and goes to her bedroom to get dressed. For a long while you remain there, upright in the holder while you hear your mother perform some mundane tasks around the house until she finally leaves to do some shopping.

Now the house is silent, all you can do is wait there, alone. The coldness of the bathroom emanates throughout your thin plastic frame, and you shiver. Many minutes pass - hours even. You are growing bored out of your mind. Your eyes droop and then you finally drop off to sleep. You are teased by a fantastic dream where you are human again, as if nothing weird happened. At some point in your dream, you are vaguely aware of a familiar tingling sensation, but your body is so numbed with cold that it barely registers.

When you awake, you find yourself in the toilet, kneeling on the cold hard tiles. Your head is inclined back and your mouth is open. Worse, you are frozen like this. You also feel really short, and have the strange sensation that your insides actually penetrate deep down into the floor and out of sight.

It feels like a huge amount of saliva has pooled inside your open mouth, and because you can't move, you can't swallow.

It's obvious to you that you turned while asleep. Furthermore, you are in the toilet and situated exactly where the toilet would be. You don't need to be a detective to realise that you've been turned into it. You want to scream. It's bad enough that you're in such an uncomfortable, inalterable position, but on top of that, of all the things you've been thus far, this gets a huge award for sheer humiliation and degradation - and you haven't even been used yet. Just knowing what is inevitably to come fills you with cold dread.

You try to yell out, but the most you can manage is to cause some tiny bubbling in the water in your mouth - rather, at the bottom of the toilet bowl. Your mind races as you try to somehow induce another transform prematurely - surely anything would be better than this. You wish and pray and bargain and beg, but nothing changes.

1142112121111112.title: You transform into something else

The front door shuts again and you recognise the sound of your mother’s heels punctuating the silence.
“Anyone home?” she asks. No one responds. She spends some time putting groceries away. Because she was away from the house for such a long time, she had been building up bowel movements and her bladder had been getting full. In fact, one of the reasons she had not stayed out longer was because she realised she would need to go to the toilet really soon.
After she has put away all the groceries, she does not hesitate to rush into the toilet.
From your position, you hear her heels hurriedly clap upon the floor, closer and louder, until she appears in the doorway. Your stomach tightens in horror as she shuts the door closed behind her – trapping you with her.
You are level with her knees and at the strange incline you are bent into, are forced to look up her towering over you. You can’t even close your eyes.
She turns away from you and hikes up her skirt, exposing her thin lacy underwear-clad bottom right into your face. For someone her age, her legs are very toned, and her buttcheeks muscular, but also soft. She yanks at her underwear and strips it down, revealing her crack.
Without restraint, she bends her legs and squats her wide buttocks, aiming squarely for the rim of your open mouth. Her warm, slightly sweaty cheeks come into contact with your lips and you feel their gelatinous forms jiggle briefly on top of you as she adjusts her position, and then comes almost the full weight of her pushing against your lower face. This forces you to directly inhale the spicy scent of her legs and bottom. You are so shocked and embarrassed that you want to cry.

Because no one is home, your mother allows herself to be a little less tact in doing her business. She completely relaxes her bowels and lets out a loud, long explosion of gas right into your open mouth. You feel the hot air blast down your throat and actually vibrate the air inside your mouth. Worse, her bottom completely covers the seat, sealing the foul air inside you and banning you from getting a fresh breath.

She lets loose another couple of noisy expulsions, until the air inside your mouth actually feels denser, almost as if turning solid from all the gas packed in there.
She lets out a sigh of relief, before directing a thick warm stream of pee into what would otherwise be your tongue, and you helplessly feel it draining down your throat. She pees for what seems like ages. This should not be surprising, however, as you know your mother is a fit type who likes to keep hydrated with lots of water for her frequent work outs at the gym – add to that her usual coffees, wines, beers, juices, and you get very voluminous, strong smelling quantities of pee.
The water being held at the back of your mouth quickly turns a concentrated yellow, and thick with odour which soon becomes more offensive than her gas. You don’t know what’s worse; having to hold it in your mouth like this, or having to swallow it.

Your mother grunts and pushes, and then manages to push out an enormous turd into you, which lands heavily into your mouth and actually causes the urine saturated water to splash up all around the inside of your mouth. Another expulsion of gas follows, and then another turd. Whether you like it or not, the inside of your mouth begins to fill up with the huge bulks, pushing against the inside of your cheeks and into your throat. You are positively being gassed by the horrible stench, which is fanned around your mouth all the more when your mother occasionally passes a short burst of gas between turds.
After all this, she is so relieved that she sits there for a brief moment, cruelly extending the time you must endure this.

Finally, the weight lifts off your mouth as she stands up. She wipes herself with toilet paper, which is causally tossed into your mouth.

Now your mother slaps her hand down on the top of your head and pushes. This feels like it triggers your swallowing reflex, and all the crap piled up your mouth is churned around inside your mouth before being sucked down your throat. This is not really a huge relief for you, as you now feel it travelling down your oesophagus, to your stomach, and then through your intestines. For some reason you feel every nauseating step of this process in much more vivid detail than you would as a human digesting a meal. The smell continues to radiate through your insides and respiratory tubes long after the body of crap feels as though it has drained away.
Your mother continues to use you another couple of times throughout the rest of the day, again for much the same functions – although on one of those occasions she additionally pulls out her tampon and chucks that down your mouth. In the evening your mother goes out to a dinner with your father. She comes back having enjoyed herself but also having had a little too much drink, and probably a little too much to eat as well. Not long after getting back home, you hear her racing up the corridor and she falls to her knees in front of you, and grips the sides of your mouth.

114211212111112.content:
As your head slides back out of your mother’s hot, frothy mouth, a familiar tingling sensation takes over your body, and suddenly you find yourself in a cool, cramped space, like a tunnel. Its pitch black. You know you’ve just transformed again, but have no idea what you are.
Suddenly you feel the walls of your confinement collapse inwards, causing your slippery body to shoot forwards until your head breaches the exit. You land on a scratchy, uncomfortable surface, like thick pointy grass, and quickly become stuck to it.

Blinking and confused, you make out some enormous globe blocking out the light above. This is revealed to be the face of your mother. You are lying on the toothbrush you previously were, and which she has held up to her mouth.

She pauses for a second and then spontaneously unleashes a long, gassy burp right down onto you with such heat and force that your fragile form is melted down further into the bristles of the toothbrush. But the smell is the worst; it’s like a combination of ashen coffee, sour yoghurt, all mixed up in gastric juices.
“Excuse me,” she says to no one, and her words puff out the last residue of her foul expulsion in your face.
Your mother has one more thing she wants to do before brushing. The toothpaste that you turned into was actually a newly released flavour that your mother has never tried before, and she wants to be sure it tastes okay.

Of course you didn’t know this. From your perception, you see her huge reddish pillowy lips separate, revealing her mammoth pink tongue which slides. This is while you are lifted towards her mouth, until the tip of her giant tongue makes contact with your face. She presses the tip of her tongue down onto you. Your gluey surface yields without effort; your face is smushed flat and starts to melt from the heat of her tongue and her hot smelly breath fanning out on you from her half open mouth.

Even more weird, you feel parts of your ‘skin’ sticking to, and being absorbed into the surface of her tongue. She tastes you and the corners of her mouth quirk up in a smile – she really enjoys how you taste.
She eagerly stuffs the head of the toothbrush into her mouth and begins scrubbing around. You provide about as much resistance as paint against a paintbrush; you are smeared all over the surface of your mothers teeth. Parts of you also melt and fall to the bottom of her mouth, and mix with the gooey saliva pooling down there. She scrubs up and down until you are nothing but a thin, white bubbly film coating her teeth. She puts it back into her personal hygiene bag. In the instant you are returned into the bag, you feel the sensation of transformation come over you, but oddly it doesn’t seem to have its normal effect, because nothing has changed from your perspective – you are still in the bag.
Your mother’s fingers drop back inside, searching for something. They land on you, but just as quickly, flick you away as if irritated. You tumble across the bag’s floor and into a corner as the enormous fingers close around some nail polish and retract again.

While the light is still shining into the bag, you see the toe clipper across from you – which means you must have changed into something else in here, though you don’t know what. You cringe for a moment at the sight of the clipper’s blades; encrusted with toe gunk – to think, only a moment ago, that was your mouth.
A moment later, the giant fingers re-enter the bag, and this time when they brush against you, they pick you up. Moist, sticky build-up keeps you trapped in there, added to the intense pressure of her toes keeping you firmly squeezed between them. An enormous hand floats down by the foot, holding a nail polish brush tipped with shiny red polish. She is reapplying her toenail polish – and you have evidently become her toe separator.

She paints her big toenail, and you scrunch up your face as the polish fumes choke you – which, admittedly, is only slightly worse than the stench emanating from her toes. You are put back into her personal hygiene bag and she goes about her daily tasks. You are not bothered for the rest of the day and in the darkness of the bag, actually manage to get some much needed sleep. Your mouth tastes like crap, but you ignore it for now.

Many hours pass. You wake up to an odd feeling before you suddenly find yourself lying on your back on the carpet, looking up at the ceiling of your parents’ bedroom. You are on the floor right next to the side of your parents’ bed. You can hear your mother snoring. You quickly try and work out what you’ve become. Your body feels sort of flat and soft, except for your chest and head, which bulge out. Around your abdomen there is an opening up into your ribcage and the inside of your head. You can, bizarrely, feel the cool air enter the bottom of your ribcage and actually drift into your hollow-feeling head. These factors all make you fairly sure you have turned into one of your mother’s plain white slippers with the closed-toes.

You hear an alarm and there is a rustling above you, before your mother’s two big feet slam down on the ground on either side of you. You tremble in fear, but to your immense gratitude, her feet do not wear you. Instead, she walks across the room into the en suite bathroom to use the toilet. After a moment, you hear the toilet flush and the sink water run. Then her loud footfalls come closer and her feet stop short of you. You gaze up at her towering form, robed only in a short, flimsy gown. She looks down at you expressionlessly, and then her huge foot rises up and targets you.

You tense as the end of the foot angles downwards so that her toes slip in under your ribcage. You shiver; her foot is cold because of just having walked on the bathroom tiles. You feel them touch down and then slide up your spine – the floor of the slipper. The bulk of her foot begins filling up your insides. You then feel her chilly toes fill out the space inside your head, making it bulge outwards, and poke the end of your head before coming to a rest. You are assaulted full blast with the stench of her toes, which begin being absorbed into your fabric.

It’s evident you are slightly too small for her foot, but she is too lazy to buy new slippers.

She lifts up her other foot to put it into the other slipper, and her full weight presses down on you while she does so. You grit your teeth as your back is squashed down under her unforgiving sole. She then begins to trudge to the kitchen. Every time she takes a step, you are launched up into the air, and zoom forward before slamming back down on the ground. You then endure her immense weight while her other foot follows.
You are hammered against the hard ground over and over until she reaches the kitchen. Your insides are heated from her toes, whilst your back is shocked from the cold of the floor.

In the kitchen, she makes breakfast. When she sits down to eat it, some of the weight of her body is mercifully lifted from you. On the other hand, while she sits and eats, her toes dance restlessly around inside your head. Her toes really enjoy being enclosed inside your tight, warm head, and they wriggle around in thanks – you are forced to suffer the strange, infuriating feeling of them tickling the inside of your skull, itching you unbearably in a way you can’t scratch. They also smear their awful scent into you, engraving her scent into your nostrils.

Each one of her steps is like an earthquake to you. You try to ignore that your very bones rattle every time her foot comes down onto the ground. Your mind is still reeling over how much larger she is now – or rather, how much smaller you are.

On your scale, your mother is ten miles high. You estimate that means that on her scale, you are a 1/10th of a millimetre. That is phenomenally small – virtually microscopic. You could fit comfortably inside the mouth of a tiny ant. A grain of rice would be about as big as a house. Your mind refuses to accept it. Even worse, you are not even human – you are merely a piece of lint; a speck of dust.

You are caught up in a labyrinth of minute threads; all the old dusty lint stuck between your mother’s toe. The space between the second and third toe is like a canyon, but the walls of her toes are squished together, insulating what an entire moist, humid rainforest of lint, skin flakes, dirt and sweat. The little air you receive is weighed down by perspiration which soaks your form, causing you to flatten and stick to the enormous ridges of her skin. Her pores are huge craters, which are constantly churning out sebaceous oil for lubrication. Above all, you are bombarded by the eye-watering stench of your mother’s toes.
By contrast, your mother’s biggest concern right now is to empty her bowels and full bladder. She sits on the toilet and has to push hard because its a big one. Her bowels gurgle and she manages to let out a couple of long, noisy farts. The air rumbles, vibrating your tiny form - the rotten egg odour of it leaks into your fleshy prison and its even more offensive than that of toe flesh. The water splashes as she takes a dump, and then unleashes a thick stream of yellow pee. You hear the roaring gush of it from above. The rotten egg odour is swept away by the odour of ammonia.

Unfortunately, all the toilet paper has run out, so she doesn’t wipe, and a couple of deep yellow drops of urine dribble down her leg and – unluckily for you – happen to slip into the space between her toes where you are. You feel a huge wall of hot, sour liquid soak over you. Its surface tension causes it to cling to you, and absorb into your lint form. It burns inside your nostrils, mouth and eyes. You scream in pain.
Your mother doesn’t hear you. Having emptied her bladder, she gives a great sigh of relief, and wriggles her toes with satisfaction, unknowingly smearing her urine into you.

What does she do now?

1142112122.content:
The first thing you feel is a sticky, meaty weight wrapped around your body. Your brother was towering over you, and his six year old hand was wrapped around your torso. You felt human, but movement still wasn't possible. You must be the stupid G.I. Jojo or whatever he always has with him.

Looking past the titan, it was easy to tell you were in a car. But where was he going? It was the 21st, which meant...

Oh no. One of his friends was having a birthday party at Chuckie Cheese's. You were going to be immobile and 6 inches tall at that hellhole?

The car trip was rather short, much to your annoyance. You really hoped you'd transform back before arriving. Your brother and mother walk in, and you hang from his sweaty palm. Forced to look straight down, you watch his toes curl in excitement in his sandal. Horrifying.


Janet and Sam entered the main part of the building. Finding a table, Sam set his toy down before running off to join his friends. Sighing, Janet pulled out her phone and started checking her e-mail. She hated this place, but Sam absolutely loved it. She crossed her legs and began bumping her knee against the underside of the table.


You're not entirely sure why Sam brought you, since he tossed you on the table as soon as they got it. You stared at the ceiling, wondering why you had to be cursed with this terrible fate. Was there a reason, or did you just get the comically short end of the proverbial stick?

The table under you began to bump. You felt yourself moving ever so slightly with ever impact. Before you even realized it, you fell down off the table, rolling underneath it. You watched your mother shake her foot and shift her legs. She was wearing tiny black flats. You shudder, remembering the beating you took as a slipper. You're glad that was over.

All of a sudden, you felt tingly and ill. The transformation was happening again! You feel a sudden bump, and find yourself as, well, yourself. Crouched beneath the table was you as a human again. Once again, you were naked.

Looking over your body, you find most of the bruises from before gone. Perhaps the transformation only cared about the last form you took? And would you always go back to normal before undergoing a change? Impossible to tell.

However, there were more pressing concerns. You were a naked teen in the middle of Chuckie Cheese. No amount of lying could get you out of that one. If you're spotted, you'll be in more trouble than you've ever known. And so you wait, actually hoping for a transformation this time. Anything had to be better than a lifetime labelled as a pedo, right?

You had to concede that you were a bit lucky. The booth Janet chose was in the corner next to a wall, leaving you in darkness with no one to peer at you. No kids ever came this way, leaving your biggest concern the swinging foot of your mother. If she felt you, it'd be all over.

After maybe half an hour, you began to worry. You still were a human and hadn't transformed yet. The previous bouts of humanity hardly lasted ten minutes, but you stubbornly kept from changing. Then, your brother returned. You curled back against the wall as you watched his legs move. He was talking to Janet.

"Have you seen my action figure?" Shit, that was you. Reaching under you, you realize you've been sitting on the doll the entire time. It was a little odd looking at a body you used to inhabit... Never mind that. You chuck the toy at Sam's bare feet, right as you feel the tingly feeling once again.

11421121221.content:
It's odd, shifting bodies to something completely different. You've been doing it all day, but it's still really, really weird. This time, as your senses return, you find yourself staring at a massive plastic wall. A furry little creature is painted on it, but aside that, it's hard to tell what's going on.

You take a moment and feel your body. Gone are the arms and legs of the doll; in their place is a cylindrical body attached to a sturdy pole of some sort... A handle, perhaps? It wasn't much of a stretch to guess that you might be a hammer.

But what is a hammer doing at a place like Chuckie Cheese's? Putting the mole picture next to you with the whole hammer shape, you realized that you've become a part of the dangerous, dreaded Whack-A-Mole!

No sooner than this hit you, you felt a cold hand wrap around your handle. Your "face" seemed to be looking out from the flat end of the cylinder, and the person oriented it to her. Holding you in her clutches was a little girl, no older than ten. Her face, framed with light blond pigtails, was looking right past you, towards the game. Electronic beeping sounds chirped from the machine, and a synthesized voice counted down: Three! Two! ONE! START!

The girl, face twisted in concentration, swung you down. Your rear side crashed down on the hard, plastic surface of the machine, violently jarring you. She swung again and again, following a very poor Whack-A-Mole strategy. Instead of keeping the hammer (you) at the ready, she pulled you all the way back up to her face each time she missed, giving you a rather close look at her nose. Then, when a mole appeared, she swung you down as hard as she could. Her small size and your weight caused these wild swings to miss terribly each time, and soon enough the game ended.

"You lose. Try again?" The machine, cold and without sympathy, told the poor little girl of her failure. Held close to her face, you saw tears welling at the corners of her eyes. She dropped you, letting you dangle off the side of the machine. Despite how sad she looked, you were glad you weren't going for a second round. She was rough, and to be frank, her breath stank.

From your new dangling vantage point, you were able to look out across the building. It seemed the machine was in the corner of the restaurant. It didn't appear to be a very busy corner, either, since most people were playing newer machines, not the old classics. There was a wall to your left, but to your right was the rest of the building. It seemed your corner was for the oldest games in the joint; a pinball machine was near you, sitting close to an old Street Fighter cabinet. It didn't look like you'd be getting a whole lot of use.

Of course, that'd be too good to be true. Not minutes after she left, the little girl returned. This time, she brought her secret weapon. Following closely behind her was a girl way too old to be at Chuckie Cheese's. Although it was hard to tell as a hammer, she had to be at least seventeen, and probably more than that.

"Beat it for me. Pleaase?" The girl tugged at the teen's hand, pointing towards your machine. The teen shrugged. "A'ight." She got closer to you, and grabbed onto your handle. She looked at you, and you looked at her.

There was no way she'd come here willingly. Her hair was black with purple highlights, her nails were a color she'd likely refer to as "Dark Raven," and her shirt was emblazoned with the logo of some unheard of metal band. Her outfit screamed edgy. You started to get a bit worried. Yeah, these machines were built strong, but this girl wasn't likely to go easy on you.

A coin was inserted into the coin slot. The machine lit up and once again spoke the words:

Three!

Her grip tightened around you.

Two!

Her muscles flexed, showing power her sister couldn't even dream about.

ONE!

She held you at the ready, prepared to swing as hard as she could.

START!

Immediately the gentleness is gone. Her thumb treats you like any inanimate button, which you are. It presses relentlessly as the woman preforms combo after combo. It slams down in hard succession as she rapidly kicks, then lifts off for a moment, hovering like a spacecraft before slamming back down. It hurts, of course, but your body is built for this, designed to be pressed with force over and over.

The first round is over. Her thumb leaves as she presses her hands over her face; in your peripherals you can see the friend cheering. "Ah told ya, I'm the best."

Your player shook her head. "Lucky break. This time it's mine." Her thumb returns, slightly sweater than before.

The second round is intense, but after almost three minutes of violent smashing, the game comes to an end. The winner: Chun-Li. Your girl jumps back, cheering. "Hell yeah, I told you I was good."

Round three. This was the worst round for you yet, as the tension was running high. Her thumb was constantly pummeling you; gone were the moment breaks of the first round. The rough, damp skin pressed and lifted and pressed and lifted, until finally:

"Yes! I won!" Your girl steps back, a massive grin on her face. "Looks like you're buying dinner."

"Uh huh. Don't know how you did it girl, but that was some fine-ass playing. I guess we'll..."

Their voices faded as they walked away. You were a little sad that you couldn't join the celebration, but of course they didn't know you were here. To them, you were just a lightly worn button, a piece of plastic to be mashed and forgotten, left behind with nothing more than a sweaty thumb print as a goodbye. And they were right.

The tingling, now very familiar to you, returned, and in a moment you were blinking awake, still naked, and slightly damp with sweat.

This time, however, you weren't in the Chuckie Cheese's. Instead, you found yourself in the parking lot. In the middle of the afternoon. On a very busy day. It took literal seconds for a scream to erupt from somewhere behind you. "Mommy! There's a naked man over there!"

No time to react, you shield your face and junk and sprint away, through lines of cars and past screaming kids. This was exactly what you'd wanted to avoid, and now it was happening.

A hand grabs your shoulder. You peer from between fingers; a cop is standing there, and she doesn't look amused.

"Excuse me, sir, you are going to have to come with me." Her voice was a no-nonsense kind of command, and yet you still tried to explain.

"I-I didn't mean to be here, I swear. I was turned into an action figure that was brought here, then into a whack-a-mole, then into an arcade cabinet button, and then I was out here and naked, and I really am sorry and once I have this transformation thing worked out I'll never come back here again."

She looked at you for a moment. "Sir," she began. "Have you been drinking?"

"No!" You waved your hands in front of you. "I swear, I've been turning into inanimate objects all goddamn day."

"Alright then. I guess you'll be heading to the loony bin."

"Wait, no! I'm not crazy!" The cop grabbed a pair of cuffs off her belt. She pushed you face down into the asphalt, and locked your wrists together.

"You have the right to remain silent," she began, but her reading of the Miranda rights was interrupted as you felt that familiar tingling.

"I'm so sorry!" You shout, before the world shifts again.

11421121221122.content:
The word falls from your lips, and suddenly you're resting on the ground. You feel like you're holding onto a heavy weight with all four limbs, while part of you -- it feels like your side, maybe? -- rests on slightly damp pavement. Looking around, you can't see much -- a car tire across from you, and turning your vision around yourself, you see the underside of a different car. That's odd. You look back out....

"...all right, uh huh. Sure. No problem. Get in the car, Lisa! Sure mom. Yup. Cassie and I are on our way. Okay. Bye."

A pair of legs suddenly flashes into your field of vision, long, smooth legs that connect to a girl who walks past you, and opens a door. "Get in with Lisa, Jack. Your mom can watch them the rest of the afternoon?"

"Yeah, she's home, she said to drop them off."

A boy walks past you and disappears above you. "I wanna stay longer!"

"Liv and I need to finish our project for school, Jack," the legs say, and shut the door.

You realize that the weight on you has increased -- not a lot, but just a bit. Then the legs open another door, and disappear inside, and then....

There's a rumble, and the world starts to shake. And then it starts to spin. Slowly one way, then slowly another, then slowly accelerating, and then stopping. And starting up again. And stopping. And then, you're off.

You aren't dizzy, but you almost wish you were. The world spins by in a radial blur, and all you can do is feel the odd forces on your toroid form.

After forever, you slow, and then stop; you're in a driveway. The girl with the legs -- Cassie, you think -- steps out, and soon Jack -- must be her younger brother -- hops out and walks away. And then you feel the tingle.

This time at least you're not in public. Instead, you're lying under the car. Wait...how is that possible? The car's not nearly tall enough to give you clearance.

Rolling over, you realize that the car is gigantic -- you're probably only two feet tall, if that. When you come back to your form, you must come back at a size that allows you to fit in the area you're in. Now that you think about it, that whack-a-mole game shouldn't have been big enough to hide behind. You must have been smaller then, too.

That doesn't help much, though. For one thing, it's not like you can control it -- it was just luck that you weren't arrested. For another, you're not sure it's better to be found as a two-foot-tall naked guy than it would be to be found as a six-foot-tall naked guy. Both have their good and bad points...but mostly bad either way.

As you're thinking this, you see the feet of the teen girls walking them out of the house where they dropped their siblings. You cringe as they reach their respective doors, which creak open and close with a whumpf. The car above you dips with their weight, then roars to life. Fortunately, you start to feel the tingle again.

114211212211221.content:
The first thing you noticed was the heavy, weighty feeling of the girl's foot inside of you. You wrapped around it yet it was in charge of you, giving your flimsy canvas body form and purpose. Her socks, thicker than you would have expected for this weather, brushed against your inner lining, a unique tickling sensation only furthered by the squirming of her toes.

The second thing you noticed was the salty, rancid taste of sweat that oozed from your very being. These shoes had seen some use.

With a grunt, your host, Cassie, you believed, swung her legs up onto the dash. The foot you hugged began to bob, lightly battering your interior. "Think we can finish this today?"

You took a look at the other girl, Liv, as she drove. Not to judge a book by its cover, but she seemed kinda interesting. There was a small silver stud in her nose, a dull green streak in her dark hair, and a mischievous twinkle in her eyes. "Oh yeah, we got this. That way we can start on the..." She paused, her expression careful. "On the other project."

The foot stilled and tensed up within you. You looked at Cassie, taking in her shocked expression. She was pretty, in a blandish way; her nose was a bit too large and her blond hair a bit too stringy, but it worked for her. Maybe; it was hard to tell from here.

She put her foot back on the floor of the car, hard. The pressure sunk into you; if you had organs, they'd be flat. "Shit, Liv, did you get it? The real stuff?"

You couldn't see her from here, not past Cassie's tall, silky calves, but you could feel the smile in her words. "Oh yeah, Aunt Jenna hooked us up. Unknowingly, you know."

The toes inside you clenched, hard. "And it works? On people?"

"Oh yeah. Not even a problem. With just a little bit of work," Liv said, "we'll be able to turn people..."

"Into objects."



Sometime later, you found yourself sitting in the entrance hallway leading into Liv's house. Cassie's shoe sat beside you, where it had been discarded moments before, a slight odor drifting in the air.

You twisted your hand before your face, admiring it. It was human, through and through, flesh and blood and bones. Down there, on the floor, was canvas and string, a shoe soaked with a girl's sweat. It was completely inanimate, a creation of man to be used and thrown away. And yet not long ago it was just as much you as this meat body you were sitting in now.

You hated it. You hated being an object for others to own. You hated having no say over your body. And if those girls were telling the truth, and by god it seemed like they were, you had a chance to stop it. But, how? You had only minutes left before you lost control again. Could you even get anywhere before you lost yourself again? You had to try.

The voices of the girls, distant yet excited, lead you through the halls and up a staircase. You move as fast as you dare, trying to balance your fears of transforming and being found buck-naked. A closed door stops you; peering through the key hole, you spot them, Liv and Cassie, working over a table. Is that it, the secret to stopping this all?

In your gut, the tingling begins, crawling its way up towards your conciousness​ no matter how hard you resist. You can't let it win though, not now, not when your so close.

If you can't stop it, maybe you can control it, at least a little. Liv had a bracelet on, a gaudy plastic trinket that jiggled along her slender wrist. You focused on it, picturing yourself as it.

You slip away, your last thoughts about the bracelet.

She swung, hard. You took the first couple swings well, but the constant pounding into the plastic rodents quickly started to wear you down. While the little girl's strategy was bad, this teen's was even worse. Instead of, I don't know, planning her strikes, she wildly pounded the surface of the machine.

Her muscles were rippling with the force of the swings. The world past your head rushed by in a blur, giving the occasional glance at the shocked faces of the plastic moles and the angry grimace of the older teen.

Then, snap. Your handle broke off your body. The hammer's head rolled off the machine, towards the girl. Pain ripped through you as the teen shouted at the "shitty machine," while the girl stepped towards your body. She looked at your pain-stricken oddly. Nudging you with her sandal, she said, "It's twitching."

And so you were. The pain was much worse than when you were a slipper. It was so bad, you were actually being forced back into your human form. The tingling pushed through your body, but the searing pain changed it, made it hurt. Your last thought wasn't rather elegant, but I'll transcribe it here:

"Fuck."



As Jackie pounded the hammer's handle against the machine, Suzie couldn't help but notice the odd shaking the discarded head was going through. As it twitched on the floor, she gave it a little nudge. She looked up towards her sister, trying to explain her finding. Looking back down, she saw something horrible.

Covering her mouth, she scream as she stood in a pool of blood. Laying next to the hammerhead was the upper half of a naked boy, seemingly torn in two. The boy wasn't moving, and his eyes were glazed over. Jackie, the violent sister, retched as she saw a similar sight on the top of the Whack-A-Mole machine, except hers was the bottom half.



When you transformed, you keep the injuries you sustained in the last body you held. Since you were ripped in half as a hammer, your human body was too. Shame you couldn't survive like that. The two girls' screams alerted the management, and since then the place was known for the "Mystery of the Mangled Corpse." No one ever figured out how you died, but at least you were free of the curse.

Her mouth opened, and just a single word comes from between her braced teeth.

"Lucky."

Lucky for her, sure, but not for you. She bent down, hand open, and grabbed you up. Her skin, warm and a little sweaty, mushed into all sides of you. The swirls on the palm of her hand looked huge and menacing, lit vaguely by light between her fingers. You felt like you were rushing up, then the hand opened, dropping you into a pouch of fabric. The pocket of her shorts, most likely.

You weren't alone in here. This was her quarter pocket it seemed, as you were surrounded by metal faces of George Washington. You supposed that his face was your face right now.

It's not long at all before light filters in. The tips of the girl's push in. They brush past you, but ultimately grab a different piece of change, leaving you in the darkness once more.

It happens again, not too much later, and again some time after that. She continues to spend quarters, yanking out your round metal brothers one by one. And each time, she grabs a quarter that isn't you. Soon, it was just you and one other, all by yourself.

And then, she stops. You vaguely get the feeling that your host is no longer walking about, but before you can ponder that you feel the all too familiar tingle, and the pocket fades away.

Silently, you open your eyes. You take a quick account of the situation. Human? Yes. Naked? Unfortunately. Location?

Your heart leaps as you realize it's not Chuckie Cheese's. It seems that you're in the cargo area towards the back of a mini van, laying on the thin carpet behind the a bench seat. This could be bad.

Quickly and quietly, you risk a glance over the seat. There are three other people in the car: A driver, too far away to accurately see, and two passengers sitting on the seat you're crouched beneath. You recognize one as the girl whose pocket you'd been interned in. The other is older, a teen girl with dark purple hair and an outfit that says "I want attention."

You stifle a sigh. Every time you get your body back, you have to hide so no one sees your bare form. You lay back down, closing your eyes and awaiting the tingle.

When it returns, you become:

125.content:
When you wake up you're not sure why it feels like something is blocking the light of the sun from your window. 'Somebody must be playing a prank on me or something' you thought to yourself. But when you look up, you see your dad's face. Except this is not like a normal sight, your father is absolutely giant! He's towering over you! What the heck!? You try to squirm around, but you can't move. It's like your frozen in place. You frantically try to figure out your surroundings, but before you can guess anything, your father's hand reaches out for you, and picks you up like you're nothing at all. "Dad! What are you doing?!" You scream. But he says nothing. It's almost like he can't hear you.

Your dad was humming to himself, suddenly you hear water start to come from somewhere. And before you knew it, your face was slammed by a mass moving force of water. You didn't know what was happening. You were set down for a moment, as your dad grabbed his can of shaving cream, and rubbed it over his face. "Shaving cream?" What?

Before you knew it, you were lifted up once more. You tried to struggle once more. It was hopeless. You looked over to your side, you were your father's bathroom! Your eyes looked for your body. But there was no human there. There was only a razor in the hand of a man, your father.

Before you knew it. Your face was rubbed against the shaving cream, and against the rough bristles on his face. Your face was the blade! You could feel yourself smoothing his skin, your body's purpose at the moment was doing just as it was supposed to. But it was horrid. Since screaming and struggling didn't help, you simply gave up. You weren't sure what happened to make this transformation to you, but you only knew that you wished it would be over fast. Or hope that this nightmare would end, and you would wake up.

But it just didn't. He continued to be unaware that his hand was gripping your body(?), and using you to shave off all of the hair free from his face. After what seemed like forever, it the torture was finally over. Your dad placed you back on the tiny shelf above the sink, and rubbed at his now smooth flesh. He muttered. "Refreshing, that razor cut better today then it ever has... might just hold onto it for a bit longer."

Once he left, you shut your eyes and tried to make it all go away. The world suddenly went black.. and you woke up in...
125.title: A giant man is looming over you (Dad's razor)

info.brief_description: You transform into objects and are used or watch other characters without their knowing
info.description:
You are a teenager. Your life is relatively normal, life, school, annoying siblings, etc. Like all teenagers you are the center of your own universe. Now take a look from another perspective...

Characters:
Eric - Boy; 16 years old, 5'11" with sandy brown hair and blue eyes. Likes video games, and watching sci-fi. Not a jock but not a geek either. Is annoyed by older sister and two younger siblings. Mother and Father are divorced.
OR
Emily - Girl, 16 years old, 5'5" with short red-brown hair, and green eyes. Hobbies are secretly writing poetry on line and drawing. Hopes to be an art major. Thinks for herself but hangs with the popular kids because...that is the best place to be in high school. Has and older sister that is always busy, and two younger siblings that never shut-up. Mother eccentric and Dad is a looser...

Other Characters:
Dad: Steve Talyor: 49 years old, works in advertisements so lots of travel. Lots of co workers who love and hate him. Physically powerful man works out and has a wondering eye for the ladies. Always buying new gadgets, phones and stuff to show how successful he is.

Mom: Janet Slade: 47 years old, went back to her name. Works part time and also going to school to get a better job. Kind of shy around guys because she feels desperate. A little strung out with four kids and all the other things she needs to do. Physically a Milf because she doesn't eat a lot and is always on the move. Hopes to land an office Job when she graduates soon and get to take things slower, doesn't see kids all that often. She has a lot of cloths and things left over from her marriage because her ex- kept getting her stuff. She has money in her name from divorce but she wants to be her own woman and not a dumped wife.

Older Sister: Cellist: 18 years old, graduating high school. Big into cheerleading, boys, and fast cars. Smart and sharp as a whip. Looks could kill. Doesn't much care for other siblings, they will be left behind when she is out of here and gets her own life. Dad keeps trying to buy her love with cloths and other gifts.

Younger Sister: Courtney: 14 years old. Just staring to understand her self. Body still going through changes. Odd time between cloths and child toys. Keeps taking Cellist and Mother's stuff out of curiosity.

Younger Brother: Sam: 6 years old. Hyperactive. Gets into everything. When Mom isn't home, girls must watch him. Neighbor sometimes baby-sits. What else can I say about a 6 year old?

Neighbors, School friends, anyone you can think of. Dog next-door. It's all there and all can have a part to play.

Note: No one liners.
